short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand text posts on reddit when clicked. Can optionally remove promoted content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expands text posts on reddit to show the full content on the same page.
Allows quicker navigation due to skipping a page load.
Useful if you don't care about reading reddit comments for every post and just want to read the main text. 
This acts similarly to how a read/show more button works, but is activated on simply clicking the text inside the post.

Now includes an option to remove promoted content on reddit. Just go to the options page and click the checkbox to try it out. 

May add options in the future for transition speed or a show/read more link. 

Bugs may exist due to reddit's unique handling of off screen elements.

If you like my work, please consider a small one time donation.
